description:
Neutral Dollar is an entirely new blockchain-native financial instrument. The on-chain token processes revolve around the profit-seeking behavior of rational arbitrageurs and mimics properties of a traditional ETF in a fully transparent way.

Creation activity drives the expansion of the Neutral token supply and the redemption mechanics cause the supply to contract. This results in globally-shared liquidity, reduced volatility, and frictionless token exchange.
name: Neutral Dollar
